PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-09862021-11-29,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE IRWIN COTLER, P.C., O.C., O.Q., of Montréal, Quebec, as special adviser to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, to be known as Special Envoy on Preserving Holocaust Remembrance and Combatting Antisemitism, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year or until such time as a new Special Envoy is appointed, whichever occurs first.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of the HONOURABLE IRWIN COTLER, P.C., O.C., O.Q., of Montréal, Quebec, as special adviser to the Minister of Foreign Affairs, to be known as Special Envoy on Preserving Holocaust Remembrance and Combatting Antisemitism, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year or until such time as a new Special Envoy is appointed, whichever occurs first.
